mapper.select: SELECT LOC_CODE, LOC_NAME, LOC_REG_DATE, THUMBNAIL_URL, INSPECT_TYPE FROM LOC_LIST_VIEW WHERE REMOVE_CODE IS NULL AND HOST_CODE = #{host_code}
mapper.insert:
SELECT F_CODE('L', L_SEQ.CURRVAL) AS LOC_CODE FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO LOC(LOC_CODE, HOST_CODE, LOC_REG_DATE) VALUES(F_CODE('L', L_SEQ.NEXTVAL), #{host_code}, SYSDATE)

SELECT F_CODE('LBIF', LBIF_SEQ.CURRVAL) AS LOC_BASIC_INFO_CODE FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO LOC_BASIC_INFO (LOC_BASIC_INFO_CODE, LOC_CODE , LOC_TYPE_CODE , LOC_NAME, LOC_SHORT_INTRO, LOC_INTRO, LOC_ADDR, LOC_DETAIL_ADDR) VALUES (F_CODE('LBIF', LBIF_SEQ.NEXTVAL), #{loc_code} , (SELECT LOC_TYPE_CODE FROM LOC_TYPE WHERE LOC_TYPE = #{loc_type}) , #{loc_name}, #{loc_short_intro} , #{loc_intro}, #{loc_addr}, #{loc_detail_addr})
INSERT INTO THUMBNAIL (THUMBNAIL_CODE, LOC_BASIC_INFO_CODE, THUMBNAIL_URL) VALUES (F_CODE('TH', TH_SEQ.NEXTVAL), #{loc_basic_info_code}, #{thumbnail_url})

SELECT F_CODE('FIF', FIF_SEQ.CURRVAL) AS FACILITY_CODE FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO FACILITY_INFO(FACILITY_CODE, LOC_BASIC_INFO_CODE, FACILITY_CONTENT) VALUES(F_CODE('FIF', FIF_SEQ.NEXTVAL), #{loc_basic_info_code}, #{facility_content})

SELECT F_CODE('CAU', CAU_SEQ.CURRVAL) AS CAUTION_CODE FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CAUTION(CAUTION_CODE, LOC_BASIC_INFO_CODE, CAUTION_CONTENT) VALUES(F_CODE('CAU', CAU_SEQ.NEXTVAL), #{loc_basic_info_code}, #{caution_content})
INSERT INTO LOC_CONTACT(LOC_CONTACT_CODE, LOC_CODE , LOC_EMAIL, LOC_TEL, LOC_MAIN_TEL) VALUES(F_CODE('LC', LC_SEQ.NEXTVAL), #{loc_code} , #{loc_email}, #{loc_tel}, #{loc_main_tel})

SELECT F_CODE('LDIF', LDIF_SEQ.CURRVAL) AS LOC_DETAIL_INFO_CODE FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO LOC_DETAIL_INFO (LOC_DETAIL_INFO_CODE, LOC_CODE, MIN_PEOPLE, MAX_PEOPLE) VALUES (F_CODE('LDIF', LDIF_SEQ.NEXTVAL), #{loc_code}, #{min_people}, #{max_people})

SELECT F_CODE('LDIMG',LDIMG_SEQ.CURRVAL) AS LOC_DETAIL_IMG_CODE FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO LOC_DETAIL_IMG (LOC_DETAIL_IMG_CODE, LOC_DETAIL_INFO_CODE, LOC_DETAIL_IMG_URL) VALUES (F_CODE('LDIMG',LDIMG_SEQ.NEXTVAL), #{loc_detail_info_code}, #{loc_detail_img_url})
INSERT INTO LOC_WEB(LOC_WEB_CODE, LOC_DETAIL_INFO_CODE, LOC_WEB_URL) VALUES(F_CODE('LW', LW_SEQ.NEXTVAL), #{loc_detail_info_code}, #{loc_web_url})

INSERT INTO LOC_USE_INFO (LOC_USE_INFO_CODE, LOC_CODE, LOC_USE_HOUR , LOC_USE_DAY_OFF, LOC_USE_APPOINT_DAY_OFF) VALUES (F_CODE('LUI', LUI_SEQ.NEXTVAL), #{loc_code}, #{loc_use_hour} , #{loc_use_day_off}, #{loc_use_appoint_day_off})
INSERT INTO PACKAGE_FORM(PACKAGE_FORM_CODE, LOC_CODE) VALUES(F_CODE('PF', PF_SEQ.NEXTVAL), #{loc_code})

SELECT F_CODE('IR', IR_SEQ.CURRVAL) AS INSPECT_REG_CODE FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO INSPECT_REG_LIST(INSPECT_REG_CODE, LOC_CODE, INSPECT_REG_DATE) VALUES(F_CODE('IR', IR_SEQ.NEXTVAL), #{loc_code}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT LOC_BASIC_INFO_CODE, LOC_CODE, LOC_TYPE_CODE , LOC_NAME, LOC_SHORT_INTRO, LOC_INTRO , LOC_ADDR, LOC_DETAIL_ADDR FROM LOC_BASIC_INFO WHERE LOC_CODE=#{loc_code}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM LOC L JOIN PACKAGE_FORM PF ON L.LOC_CODE = PF.LOC_CODE JOIN PACKAGE P ON PF.PACKAGE_FORM_CODE = P.PACKAGE_FORM_CODE JOIN APPLY_PACKAGE AP ON P.PACKAGE_CODE = AP.PACKAGE_CODE JOIN BOOK_LIST BL ON AP.APPLY_PACKAGE_CODE = BL.APPLY_PACKAGE_CODE WHERE L.LOC_CODE = #{loc_code} AND (AP.APPLY_DATE + P.PACKAGE_START/24) > SYSDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOC_REMOVE(LOC_REMOVE_CODE, LOC_CODE, LOC_REMOVE_DATE) VALUES(F_CODE('LRM', LRM_SEQ.NEXTVAL), #{loc_code}, SYSDATE)
